tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V5.3.0.0 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: JAG: With Intent to Die
programme.desc: With help from Harm, Mac, Harriet, and Bud, Admiral Chedwiggen investigates the apparent suicide of his mentor, Admiral Clancy, who allegedly shot himself while on a hunting trip. Harm and company ultimately uncover who the killer was.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Father's Day
programme.desc: Mac and Harm are assigned the task of defending a young Marine whose frustration at being unable to wrest custody of his son has led to his being court-martialed for dereliction of duty.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Tiger, Tiger
programme.desc: Harm takes Josh on a weekend cruise for Navy families aboard a frigate. When the frigate is taken over by terrorists who intend to fire missiles at Cuba, Harm and Bud take matters into their own hands to stop the evil plot.(n)

programme.title: JAG: Return of Mimmy Blackhorse
programme.desc: An Army forensic pathologist joins forces with Harm, Mac, Bud and Harriet as they try to verify that newly unearthed human remains are those of a heroic Navajo "code-talker" who had been missing since WWII.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Scorp Family Robinson
programme.desc: Three weeks after they crash land on a deserted island, tensions run high for Team Scorpion when they must battle to overcome their relationship obstacles with each other in order to be rescued.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Extinction
programme.desc: Team Scorpion must work with their old nemesis Mark Collins in order to prevent the extinction of mankind. Also, Walter and Paige awkwardly navigate their new relationship. Josh Leonard guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: More Extinction
programme.desc: Team Scorpion continues to work with their nemesis, Mark Collins, in order to prevent an extinction event that could end humanity. Also, Cabe's last-minute decision while on the case leads to the possible end of his career.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Grow a Deer, A Female Deer
programme.sub-title: Grow a Deer, A Female Deer
programme.desc: When poachers almost kill a pregnant endangered deer, Team Scorpion recreates the animal's womb to try to save it and its baby's life. Also, Happy and Toby discuss the future of their family.(n)

programme.title: Scorpion: Nuke Kids on the Block
programme.desc: While decommissioning an old nuclear missile, a simple accident causes Team Scorpion to endure exposure to toxic vapor while trying to prevent the nuke from detonating.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Everlasting
programme.desc: The officers of 15 Division work to track down TED MCDONALD (the car-bomber from Ep. 510). But even after catching him, they realize Ted has more targets set to explode out there. The clock is ticking.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Open Windows
programme.desc: Andy is attacked by an intruder at Traci’s place and the Sex Crimes Unit steps in to take over the case their way, 15 Division will have decide whether to take matters into their own hands.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Perfect Family
programme.desc: Andy’s ideas about what makes a perfect family are put into perspective when she meets an out-of-control teen who needs to be protected from her own conservative family.(n)

programme.title: Rookie Blue: Uprising
programme.desc: A riot breaks out at a women’s correctional institute while Andy, Juliet, Nick, and Gail are there to transfer prisoners. They end up in a lock-down situation that finds Andy and Juliet trapped with a woman desperate to prove her innocence.(n)

programme.title: NEW & EXCLUSIVE! Most Haunted
programme.desc: Yvette and her world-famous team continue investigating Eden Camp. Splitting into lone vigils, they quickly regret it as lost souls, dark shadows, and disembodied voices haunt this living museum, all eager to make their presence known.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Fort Paull Part 2
programme.desc: Part 2. The Most Haunted team explore the underground of Fort Paull. With its foundations and footprint dating back 100’s of years the team are faced with some terrifying ordeals.(n)

programme.title: Most Haunted: Knottingley Town Hall
programme.desc: This location is said to be overflowing with paranormal activity, which doesn’t disappoint.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: French Quarter Massacre
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS heads out to New Orleans, Louisiana to investigate their first case without Grant: The Jimani Lounge Massacre.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Episode 12
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.(n)

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Hindenburg Crash Site
programme.desc: In the exciting season finale, TAPS travels to the site where Hindenburg, one of history's most infamous disasters, took place.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Dark Backward
programme.desc: Trance runs through a number of different scenarios, trying to find one in which her crewmates don't die.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Risk-All Point
programme.desc: A more powerful Andromeda ship explodes due to likely sabotage, forcing Dylan's crew to save them.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: The Right Horse
programme.desc: Beka endangers both her crew and an entire planet when a former love shows up.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: What Happens to a Rev Deferred?
programme.sub-title: What Happens to a Rev Deferred?
programme.desc: The Andromeda receives a cry for help from Rev Bam.(n)

programme.title: Andromeda: Point of the Spear
programme.desc: After a Commonwealth planet is attacked by Pyrian pyroformers, Dylan is forced to fight to protect the new planet.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.17
programme.desc: Lying to the police about suicidal behavior, cheating with the babysitter, and feeding a gambling addiction are allegations estranged parents fight over and deny.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.214
programme.desc: A man's parole is at risk due to possession charges. He's sued for jail calls and accused of selling fake jewelry. A man sues his niece's friend for allegedly damaging his car at a party.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.155
programme.desc: Man blames ex-girlfriend for loss of business, belongings, and child care. Ex-girlfriend accuses him of assault and theft. Woman tries to access ex-boyfriend's bank account for $5,000 surgery bill reimbursement.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.42
programme.desc: A 10-year-old boy allegedly shoots up his neighbor’s shed and trailer with a BB gun/A woman is sued for stopping payment on a cell phone she bought on eBay; she claims the phone only worked in Canada and that she was ripped off.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.60
programme.desc: Labeled as a “sperm donor” instead of a father by the mother of his child, a man insists that he wants to be involved in his child’s life.\nThey fight over a loan to secure a home.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.149
programme.desc: Parents sue tattoo shop to remove underage daughter's tattoo. Woman sues ex for washer, dryer, and love seats; he claims they're even after she sold her engagement ring.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.104
programme.desc: Woman accuses fiancé of infidelity while she's in hospital; accused of car vandalism/Woman sues ex-friend for selling fridge she loaned him.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.195
programme.desc: Slashed tires are the end result when feuding neighbors share adjacent parking spaces.\t\t\t\r\nFake diamond earrings, serious bouts of jealously, and dueling restraining orders come into play when ex-lovers fight over an unpaid loan.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.106
programme.desc: Former friend sues woman for car accidents and repossessions after buying car in his name/Pool party ends in fight over iPhone ruined when girl pushed into pool.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.148
programme.desc: Jealousy leads to candlestick attack on ex's truck window. Teen sues friend for car damage; friend admits drinking led to incident.(n)

programme.title: Judge Judy: Episode 13.29
programme.desc: Siblings dispute deceased grandmother's estate, personal property, and damages from alleged mutual assault/Woman sues ex-boyfriend for alleged life-threatening phone call over broken apartment lease, involving alleged marijuana and meth use.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The remaining chefs compete in their first individual challenge by attempting to create a dish that looks as good as it tastes.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The four remaining chefs must prepare vegetarian entrées for 80 guests; the challenge winner receives a makeover and lunch with Gordon; two contestants fall apart during the dinner service.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: International culinary experts serve as guest judges when the three finalists create dishes from various parts of the world.(n)

programme.title: Hell's Kitchen USA
programme.desc: The final two chefs do battle in the final challenge and dinner service; chef Ramsay chooses the winner.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: This episode nets an exclusive “behind the scenes” look at what it really takes to get fish on our dinner plates.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Dan Dizio is the CEO of the fastest growing pretzel bakery on the East Coast, Philly Pretzel Factory. Dan goes undercover as Michael Downs, a data entry processor who will be switching jobs with Philly Pretzel employees.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Purdy’s dominates the West Coast, but is struggling to make an impression elsewhere. To boost sales, the Chocolate Queen travels the country, working in disguise in her own stores and factory floors.(n)

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: PJ’s Pets is one of the nation’s oldest pet store chains, but the company has a new President in place, and she’s determined to rattle a few cages. Margaret Kordas steps out of her stilettos when she spends a week working in her own stores.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: It's Not Funny
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy interrupt a comedian's preparations for a show to repossess his Dodge, but not if his girlfriend has anything to say about it. Then, Lyndah & Sonia respond to a tip and sabotage a paparazzo's big shot by hooking his car.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: A Zamboni?
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy interrupt a debtor's tattooing session to reclaim his vehicle. Then, Sonia and Lyndah find themselves in an uncomfortable situation when they barge in on a couple engaging in some risqué role-playing.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Instruction and Destruction
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Froy repossess an experimental concept motorcycle from a hose-wielding yuppie. Then, Froy and Sonia head to a casting agency to repossess a car from a two-faced receptionist with a special talent for four-letter words.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Angry Swarms
programme.desc: Matt, Lou, and Lyndah try to repo a car from a man who is not afraid to throw some punches. Then, Matt and Lou face a dilemma when they realize their target vehicle is filled with angry bees. And, Sonia and Froy hit the airwaves to reclaim a truck.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: We Have to Dispose of It
programme.sub-title: We Have to Dispose of It
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Matt hunt down a truck that's being used by a pool cleaner to engage in some illicit activities with a collection of wealthy wives. Then, Lou and Sonia find themselves in the middle of a business dispute when they try to sneak off.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Smart and Stupids
programme.desc: First, Sonia and Matt hunt down a truck that's being used by a pool cleaner to engage in some illicit activities with a collection of wealthy wives. Then, Lou and Sonia find themselves in the middle of a business dispute when they try to sneak off with...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Repo Basher vs. Matt
programme.desc: Lou and Froy repo a vehicle in a bad part of town and somebody gets punched in the face. Then, Sonia and Lyndah interrupt a tennis match to retrieve an automobile. Plus, Matt and Froy confront an out-of-control director in the middle of a shoot.(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Tactical Planning
programme.desc: Matt, Froy, and Lou get a tip on a car whose owner has a boyfriend known for taking his fists to repossessors. Then, Lou and Matt derail an international expedition when they haul off with a tourist bus. And, Sonia and Froy bring some unwanted heat...(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Four Wheel Surprise
programme.desc: Matt and Froy walk into a moral gray area when they repossess a vehicle by stealing it. Then, Sonia and Matt discover their target van is being used in an investigation of highly toxic material. And, Matt poses as a valet to retrieve a car from an irate..(n)

programme.title: Operation Repo: Breakdowns and Beatdowns
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy head into a bad part of town to find that their target car is owned by bat-equipped gang bangers. Then, a seemingly friendly teacher and an assistant principal nearly come to blows when Froy and Sonia come around to repossess.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Poaching Timmy
programme.desc: When Timmy grows tired of dealing with Russell's demeaning demands and Audrey has had it with her terrible assistant, the two find a possible solution in working together. Meanwhile, Jeff tries to recreate the conditions that led to a Giants win.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Old Timer's Day
programme.desc: Jeff tries to prove to Audrey he's young and spry and invites her to watch him play softball. While up at bat, a simple sneeze throws his back out, but he insists on playing in the tournament game.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Challenge
programme.desc: When Jeff, Russell, and Adam make a bet to see who would be able to score the soonest, the three put their thinking caps on and rise up to the challenge.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Flirting
programme.desc: On the advice of Russell, Jack's flirtation with a colleague at work reveals that she's more than happy to have an affair. Russell, realizing he left his phone at the home of a one-night stand, sends Timmy to find it.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Four Pillars
programme.desc: To make Audrey happy, Jeff begrudgingly agrees to see a couple's therapist. Meanwhile, Russell develops a crush on Timmy's fiancé.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Ghost Story
programme.desc: Audrey is upset when Jeff reveals to her that he does not believe she saw her dead grandmother's ghost. Meanwhile, Russell tries to persuade Timmy not to go through with his arranged marriage.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Indian Giver
programme.desc: Audrey is surprised by Jeff's sudden interest in her favorite reality show until she discovers the reason. Meanwhile, to Russell's delight, Timmy has second thoughts about his impending arranged marriage.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: 3rd Wheel
programme.desc: Unbeknownst to Jeff, Audrey lies to her homely friend Liz that she is on Jeff's list of women he would sleep with if Audrey were not around.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: Snoozin' For A Bruisin'
programme.desc: When Jeff and Audrey switch sides of the bed, Jeff accidentally rolls over and clocks Audrey in the face, landing her in the hospital.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement: The Reunion
programme.desc: Audrey attends her high school reunion intent on proving to her former classmates how great her life is in New York City. Meanwhile, Russell accidentally ruins Timmy's dinner party.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Easy Rider
programme.desc: What looks like a routine pick-up turns into a complicated case of betrayal, deceit, as well as quality nail care as Dog and company track down a fugitive alleged to be an abusive boyfriend with one too many friends in his close knit community.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Midnight Run
programme.desc: This fugitive has a bad reputation and a knack for running from the law. The pursuit has Dog and team traveling through an urban dystopia of suspicion, false leads and mistrust.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Hunt for Santa
programme.desc: Dog decides he needs to help his son Garry believe in Santa Claus again. So now the Dog, with a posse expanded to include his children and grandchildren, sets off on a hunt through the Colorado Rockies for Santa Claus himself!(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Call Waiting
programme.desc: Dog's target for today has been in trouble with the law since he was a juvenile. And he seems willing to use any trick in the system to avoid capture by Dog. In this match of wits, will Dog prevail?(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Kid Stuff
programme.desc: A fugitive from justice is on the lam and it's Dog's job to find him. When they hit the last known address they discover he already has pulled up stakes and left no forwarding address. The posse's one hope is to locate his girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Easy Does It
programme.desc: There is a running joke in the posse that every time Bobby Brown asks them for help with a fugitive, he always promises them it's "an easy one," but the hunts end up being epic searches.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Cannonball Runs
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival - Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Mo Math, Mo Problems
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie, they rekindle an old argument of whether Jase can outrun a truck.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Coop! There It Is!
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project - renovating the chicken coop.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Friday Afternoon Lights
programme.desc: When Willie becomes an assistant coach on Lil' Will's struggling football team, his authority is tested when the kids challenge the adults to a scrimmage. Meanwhile, Kay brings Jep and Si to an aquarobics class at a local health club.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Master and Duck Commander
programme.desc: When Jase and the guys transform an old pontoon boat into a floating duck blind, they are faced with the impending question of whether or not it will actually float. Meanwhile, Kay's dog Bobo misbehaves.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Inlawful Entry
programme.desc: When Missy's parents visit, her father convinces Jase to take him on a quail hunt. But while their "bonding hunt" yields very few quail, it does bring them closer together as friends. Meanwhile, Willie helps John Luke start his own snow cone business.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Flock and Key
programme.desc: Si recruits his nephews to help him transport a storage container to his backyard, but things take a turn when Jep becomes locked inside the box. Meanwhile, Jase helps Mia prepare for her cheerleading competition, but the only problem is he has no idea.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Ball in the Family
programme.desc: When Willie's old rival Phillip McMillan challenges him to a game of dodgeball, Willie recruits his family members to settle a score once and for all. Meanwhile, Si thinks his cat is cheating on him with another family, so he recruits Miss Kay.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Drone Survivor
programme.desc: When Jase and Phil make a bet about whether or not human beings in a duck blind are visible from the air, Jep buys a drone copter to get a "bird's eye" view, but ends up losing it in the process.(n)

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Alan in Charge
programme.desc: Jase and the guys convince Willie to hire his older brother Alan to work at Duck Commander, but when Alan begins micromanaging everyone, they quickly change their mind. Meanwhile, the ladies take a self-defense class and use John Luke as a punching bag.(n)

programme.title: Minotaur: Minotaur
programme.desc: When the villagers offer their brethren as a sacrifice to the Minotaur, Theo (Tom Hardy) sets off on a harrowing quest to the labyrinth to kill the evil bull-god.(n)

programme.title: Automata
programme.desc: Jacq Vaucan (Antonio Banderas, 'The Mask of Zorro') is an insurance agent of ROC robotics corporation who investigates cases of robots violating their primary protocols against altering themselves.(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Volume 1
programme.desc: Four years after taking a bullet in the head at her own wedding, The Bride emerges from a coma and decides it’s time for payback…with a vengeance!(n)

programme.title: Kill Bill: Volume 2
programme.desc: The Bride is back with a vengeance and taking aim at the only survivors from the squad of assassins who betrayed her four years earlier. It’s all leading up to the ultimate confrontation with Bill, her former master and the man who ordered her execution!(n)

programme.title: Lucky Number Slevin
programme.desc: A case of mistaken identity lands Slevin into the middle of a war being plotted by two of the city's most rival crime bosses: The Rabbi and The Boss.(n)

programme.title: Kickboxer
programme.desc: When kickboxing champ Eric Sloane is crippled in the ring by the evil Tong Po, Eric's younger brother, Kurt, seeks vengeance.(n)

programme.title: A Country Christmas Story
programme.desc: Musical icon and multiple Grammy Award winner Dolly Parton and Grammy Award nominated R&B singer and producer Brian McKnight star in this Lifetime Original Movie.(n)

programme.title: Megan's Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: When Megan is taken away from the only life she’s ever known and moves to a small town in West Virginia, she struggles to fit in. She also gives up her one true passion, dancing. But the nativity at her local church might just turn her life around.(n)

programme.title: Family Games
programme.desc: Sloane and her boyfriend Barrett return to her childhood home determined to ruin her father Roan's re-marriage. Family secrets surface and give rise to a puzzling future.(n)

programme.title: The Wrong Girl
programme.desc: Sophia is an ideal 17 year old student, who quickly strikes up a friendship with Grace, the new girl in school. But their friendship takes a sinister turn when Grace begins disrupting the lives of Sophia and her family.(n)

programme.title: Ali
programme.desc: Muhammad Ali (Will Smith) battles Sonny Liston, Joe Frazier and George Foreman and raises controversy outside the ring.(n)

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: A Texas Ranger investigates a series of unexplained deaths in a town called Helena.(n)

programme.title: Red Sun: Red Sun
programme.desc: In 1870, a gang robs a train and steals a ceremonial Japanese sword meant as a gift for the U.S. President, prompting a manhunt to retrieve it.(n)

programme.title: For The Love Of Benji
programme.desc: Benji is back! En route to a vacation in Greece Benji becomes separated from the family in Athens, Benji finds himself on the run from an assortment of international spies seeking an energy scientist, who has been working on a secret formula.(n)

programme.title: Legendary
programme.desc: Cal Chetley is a bright, engaging, undersized fifteen year-old who's been picked on most of his life. Cal joins his high school wrestling team in the hopes his brother will train him. More importantly, Cal uses wrestling as the tool to reunite his family.(n)

programme.title: Blue Iguana
programme.desc: Ex-jailbirds Eddie and Paul are on parole and working in a New York diner. Their lives are a dead end. That is, until English lawyer Katherine Rookwood walks into the diner with an offer they can't refuse. Feat: Sam Rockwell.(n)

programme.title: Ghost World
programme.desc: The story of neo-cool Enid and Rebecca who, faced with graduation from high school take a hard look at the world they wryly observe. When Rebecca focuses her attention on mutual romantic fixation Josh, the girls friendship is forever changed.(n)

programme.title: The Embezzler
programme.desc: A quiet, respectable, henpecked bank cashier learns that he has only a few years left to live. He decides to embezzle money from the bank where he works and enjoy the rest of his days in South America.(n)

programme.title: The Hideout
programme.desc: An insurance investigator has a chance encounter with the sister of a fur dealer and soon finds himself embroiled in intrigue involving a case filled with cash as well as a potential outbreak of anthrax.(n)

programme.title: Cottage to Let
programme.desc: Nazis try to learn the plans and location of a secret bomb sight in Scotland from an Allied scientist.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a mentally challenged dock worker in 1964, harassed by co-workers, taunted by strangers and protected only by a caring brother. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes a Southern lawyer in 1957, charged with defending a black housekeeper who has willingly confessed to a murder she did not commit. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) becomes the understudy to the talented, if somewhat inebriated, star of "Man of La Mancha.'' Guest star: Tony Award-winner John Cullum.(n)

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: Sam (Scott Bakula) leaps into the life of a college fraternity brother in the late '60s and must prevent a radical student (Stacy Edwards) from bombing the chemistry lab. With Dean Stockwell.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Instinct
programme.desc: Magnus and the Sanctuary team attempt to capture a rare and deadly creature - all under the watchful eye of a local news crew.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Revelations Pt 1
programme.desc: Abnormals in remote regions are subjected to an airborne biological agent that compels them to launch a violent string of murders.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: Revelations Pt 2
programme.desc: In the season finale of Sanctuary, The Five, led by Magnus, attempt to find the secret labyrinth in the decimated city of Bhalasaam. Once located, they must complete a series of cryptic tests that can only be achieved using the powers of The Five.(n)

programme.title: Sanctuary: End of Nights Pt 1
programme.desc: Dr. Helen Magnus continues her desperate search for her daughter, Ashley, who is still held prisoner by the Cabal. Together, Magnus and John Druitt interrogate their most elusive contacts.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hula Moola
programme.desc: Ton and Allen jet to the Hawaiian islands where they're joined by a feisty new female assistant! The team uncovers a pair of James Bond-style gadgets designed for high-speed underwater travel and a vintage sled.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: The Jersey Score
programme.desc: Ton & Allen attend a silent auction in NJ, but that doesn't stop the local buyers from letting them know they're not welcome! They uncover a skeet throwing machine from the 1960's & a vintage vehicle with some real horsepower!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Hot Wheels
programme.desc: '70s sand rail dune racer with rally hemi heads; 1965 replica Mustang pool table; off-road racing gear.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Friends in Hawaii Places
programme.desc: Allen &Ton enlist an assistant, Carolyn, and Allen's Hawaiian buddy, Junior, to help them battle local buyers. The guys find a WWII-era motor scooter and a stash of antique Polynesian tattoo tools that get used on Ton!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Voodoo Moola
programme.desc: Allen & Ton hit a storage auction in Louisiana's Capitol City and quickly find themselves in trouble with the law! The guys uncover a pair of racing lawnmowers and then stumble on an antique barber chair from the early 1900s!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Drumming Up Cash
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face some silent but deadly competition at an auction in nearby Glendale. They discover a Zildjian brand percussion cymbal from the 1940's and a pyrotechnics control board designed for large-scale fireworks displays!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Quadzilla Attacks!
programme.desc: Extreme Quadzilla ATV, the fastest 4 wheeler ever; a 1910s Remington Derringer and an 1880s Palm Squeezer pistol; revolutionary 1800s Western Electric telephone with a crank dial.(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Dead Aim
programme.desc: Ton & Allen face-off against an auction buyer with shady bidding tactics and even more questionable fashion sense. The guys find a custom-built monowheel & a rifle designed to ward off grave robbers in the early 19th century!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sidecar Surprise
programme.desc: An unassuming mom in an oversized sweater tries to pull the wool over Ton & Allen's eyes at a storage auction in Arlington, VA. The guys uncover a black powder cannon designed in the 15th century & a Russian military motorcycle!(n)

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Beantown Bidders
programme.desc: 1800s blackpowder whaling harpoon; 1940s Schwinn Town & Country tandem bicycle; a vintage American flag collection that could be worth thousands.(n)
